Translations.Text: Nihsandeha amara -- amara sbayam tomara kache e'i kuraaana eka abatarane abatirna karechi.
Sutaram tomara prabhura nirdesera jan'ya adhyabasaya caliye ya'o, ara tadera madhyekara kono papisthera athaba satyapratyakhyana- karira ajna palana karo na.
Ara tomara prabhura nama kirtana karo sakale o bikele
ara ratera theke tamra prati sijada karo, ara lanba rata paryanta tamra gunagana karo.
Nihsandeha era bhalabase asthayi jibana, ara abahela kare edera samanera eka kathina dinake.
Amara'i tadera srsti karechi ebam majabuta karechi tadera gathana, kaje'i yakhana amara ca'iba takhana tadera anurupadera amara badale debo amula paribartane.
Nihsandeha eti eka smaraniya barta, sutaram ye iccha kare se tara prabhura dike patha dharuka.
Ara tomara ca'o na allahâ€Œra ca'oya byatireke. Nihsandeha allah hacchena sarbajnata, paramajnani.
Tini yake iccha karena take tamra anugrahera madhye prabesa karana. Kinta an'yayakarira -- tadera jan'ya tini tairi karechena marmantuda sasti.
